org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.util

Annotation Type ApiMethod


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ApiMethod
    This class has three responsibilities:
    1. Expose endpoint methods using id & name properties
    2. Authorize calls to endpoint methods using authTypes property
    3. Expose filters using the rest of the properties

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String id
      Method identifier, as opposed to translatable name.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      AuthRule[] authTypes
      Authorization rules that must be applied to this method.
      java.lang.String[] columns
      Link this filter to a list of columns.
      FilterType[] filterType
      Specified where this filter can be used.
      java.lang.String name
      Translatable method name.
      java.lang.String tab
      In which tab to display this filter.
      boolean ui
      Whenever to display this filter in UI.
      java.lang.String visibilityCheck
      Method name in same class to be called to determine visibility of this method.

    • Element Detail

      • id

        public abstract java.lang.String id
        Method identifier, as opposed to translatable name.

      • ui

        public abstract boolean ui
        Whenever to display this filter in UI.

        Note: Used in filters only.

        Default:
        false

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        Translatable method name.
        Default:
        ""

      • columns

        public abstract java.lang.String[] columns
        Link this filter to a list of columns.

        Note: Used in filters only.

        Default:
        "N/A"

      • filterType

        public abstract FilterType[] filterType
        Specified where this filter can be used.

        Note: Used in filters only.

        Default:
        org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.util.FilterType.ALL

      • tab

        public abstract java.lang.String tab
        In which tab to display this filter.

        Note: Used in filters only.

        Default:
        "Unassigned"

      • visibilityCheck

        public abstract java.lang.String visibilityCheck
        Method name in same class to be called to determine visibility of this method. The signature must be: public boolean methodName()

        Note: Used in filters only.

        Default:
        ""

      • authTypes

        public abstract AuthRule[] authTypes
        Authorization rules that must be applied to this method. Default is no authorization to be done.
        Default:
        {}
